revision.text:
Welcome to the test semantic database '''Virus DB'''. Main commands are on the left panel. To modify a page select the "Edit" command in the "Actions" button on the right.
Some computation on current data:
* '''Positives:''' {{#vardefineecho: pos |{{#ask: [[Category:Samplings]] [[result::positive]] |?Result |format=count |limit=5000 |offset=0 }} }} * '''Positives ratio:''' {{#expr: {{#var: pos}} / {{#ask: [[Category:Samplings]] |?Result |format=count |limit=5000 |offset=0 }} * 100.0 round 3}}%
* to add an entry: [[Special:Search|search]] for it in order to avoid duplicate entries or look up it in the [[Data tables]]. Once you are sure that it is not present, you can [[Special:FormEdit/Patient|add]] the entry. If necessary, in the form there is a security check to avoid entries duplication that is based on the fields of the ID (that of "Codice Fiscale", in Italian) * to modify an entry: [[Special:Search|search]] for it and then select the correct entry from the results in order to avoid duplication. If you do not find it then you can [[Special:FormEdit/Patient|add]] the entry. The commands are on the left. * search data: [[Special:Ask|Semantic search]] * perform a faceted search: [[Special:BrowseData/Patients|Explore data]] * have an overview of the current data: [[Data tables]] * frequency distributions: ** [[Pie charts]] ** [[Bar charts]] ** [[Histograms]] * statistics on bivariate data ('''note:''' without analyses about initial hypotheses, such as normality of data) ** classes: [[Boxplots]] ** numerical data: [[Scatterplots]] * distribution of data: ** spatial distribution: [[Maps]] * [[Export data|Export data]]
[[Special:Categories|Categories]] allow to obtain entry lists and exploit trasversal on hierarchies of concepts.
<hr />
[[Visible to::whitelist|'''Visible to: ''']] [[Visible to group::viewers|viewers]] [[Visible to group::editors|editors]]
[[Editable by::whitelist|'''Editable by: ''']] [[Editable by group::editors|editors]]

* Navigation ** mainpage|mainpage-description ** recentchanges-url|recentchanges ** randompage-url|randompage * Database ** Special:FormEdit/Patient|Add an entry ** Modify an entry|Modify an entry ** Special:Ask|Semantic search ** Special:PropChainsHelper|Property chains helper ** Special:BrowseData/Patients|Explore data ** Data tables|Data tables ** Plots|Plots ** Maps|Maps ** Export data|Export data * SEARCH * TOOLBOX
<hr />
[[Visible to::whitelist|'''Visible to: ''']] [[Visible to group::viewers|viewers]] [[Visible to group::editors|editors]]

Usage examples: * '''Pie charts''': {{#widget:ShinyPlotSrv |prop1_label=Property|prop1_data=value1,value2,... |prop2_label=|prop2_data= |prop3_label=Classes|prop3_data= |plot=piesSrvAPI|title=Distribution of the property}} * '''Bar charts''': {{#widget:ShinyPlotSrv |prop1_label=Property|prop1_data=value1,value2,... |prop2_label=|prop2_data= |prop3_label=Classes|prop3_data= |plot=hbarsSrvAPI|title=Distribution of the property}} * '''Histograms''': {{#widget:ShinyPlotSrv |prop1_label=Property|prop1_data=class1,class2,... |prop2_label=Classes|prop2_data=value1,value2,... |prop3_label=Classes|prop3_data= |plot=barsSrvAPI|title=Distribution of the property}} * '''Boxplots''': {{#widget:ShinyPlotSrv |prop1_label=Class|prop1_data=class1,class2,... |prop2_label=Property|prop2_data=value1,value2,... |plot=boxplotsSrvAPI|title=Distribution of the properties}} * '''Scatterplots''': {{#widget:ShinyPlotSrv |prop1_label=Property1|prop1_data=class1,class2,... |prop2_label=Property2|prop2_data=value1,value2,... |prop3_label=Classes|prop3_data= |plot=scatterplotsSrvAPI|title=Correlation between the properties}}




[[Visible to::whitelist|'''Visible to: ''']] [[Visible to group::viewers|viewers]] [[Visible to group::editors|editors]] [[Editable by::whitelist|'''Editable by: ''']] [[Editable by group::editors|editors]]

Form for searching Patients
[[Visible to::whitelist|'''Visible to: ''']] [[Visible to group::viewers|viewers]] [[Visible to group::editors|editors]] [[Editable by::whitelist|'''Editable by: ''']] [[Editable by group::editors|editors]]
{{{info|query form at top}}} {{{for template|SearchPatient}}}
Search is case sensitive. ==Main== Data = {| class='formtable' ! name | {{{field|Name|input type=text|property=Name|class=identifier}}} |- ! surname | {{{field|Surname|input type=text|property=Surname|class=identifier}}} |- ! year of birth | {{{field|Year of birth|input type=number|class=identifier}}} |- ! birthplace | {{{field|Birthplace|input type=text|property=Birthplace|class=identifier}}} |- |}
{{{end template}}}
[[Visible to::whitelist|'''Visible to: ''']] [[Visible to group::viewers|viewers]] [[Visible to group::editors|editors]] [[Editable by::whitelist|'''Editable by: ''']] [[Editable by group::editors|editors]]

Template for searching Patients
[[Visible to::whitelist|'''Visible to: ''']] [[Visible to group::viewers|viewers]] [[Visible to group::editors|editors]] [[Editable by::whitelist|'''Editable by: ''']] [[Editable by group::editors|editors]] Reported Patients satisfy the following criteria: * field '''name''' {{#if: {{{Name|}}} | contains "{{{Name|}}}" | is unspecified }}; * field '''surname''' {{#if: {{{Surname|}}} | contains "{{{Surname|}}}" | is unspecified }}; * field '''date of birth''' {{#if: {{{Date of birth|}}} | is "{{{Date of birth|}}}" | is unspecified }}; * field '''place of birth''' {{#if: {{{Place of birth|}}} | contains "{{{Place of birth|}}}" | is unspecified }};
Patients = {{#ask: [[Category:Patients]] {{#if: {{{Name|}}} | [[Name::~{{{Name|}}}]] }} {{#if: {{{Surname|}}} | [[Surname::~{{{Surname|}}}]] }} {{#if: {{{Year of birth|}}} | [[Date of birth::>{{{Year of birth|}}}]] [[Date of birth::<{{{Year of birth|}}}-12-31 ]] }} {{#if: {{{Place of birth|}}} | [[Place of birth::{{{Place of birth|}}}]] }} |?Name = name |?Surname = surname |?Date of birth = date of birth |?Place of birth = place of birth |?Gender = gender |mainlabel = Patient |format = table |class = datatable }} |-|
[[Visible to::whitelist|'''Visible to: ''']] [[Visible to group::viewers|viewers]] [[Visible to group::editors|editors]] [[Editable by::whitelist|'''Editable by: ''']] [[Editable by group::editors|editors]]

To modify a(n existing) entry you should [[Special:Search|search]] for it and then edit its form, in order to avoid duplication. If you do not find it you can [[Special:FormEdit/Patient|add]] it.

<noinclude> {{#referencelist: |header=Notes |listtype=ul |references=falda2016el|+sep=; }} </noinclude>
<includeonly> {{#scite: |reference=falda2016el |type=journal |title=Eliciting the Functional Taxonomy from protein annotations and taxa |authors=Marco Falda;Enrico Lavezzo;Paolo Fontana;Luca Bianco;Michele Berselli;Elide Formentin;Stefano Toppo|+sep=; |journal=Scientific Reports |publisher=Springer Science and Business Media LLC |year=2016 |volume=6 |issue=1 |doi=10.1038/srep31971 |issn=2045-2322 |retrieved-from=https://dx.doi.org/ |retrieved-on=2020-11-08 |@show=true }} </includeonly>

function dump(o) if type(o) == 'table' then local s = '{ ' for k,v in pairs(o) do if type(k) ~= 'number' then k = '"'..k..'"' end s = s .. '['..k..'] = ' .. dump(v) .. ',' end return s .. '} ' else return tostring(o) end end function checkIfNil(value) if value == nil or value == '' then return 0.0 end return tonumber(value) end local p = {} function p.dynIndices(frame) if not mw.smw then return "mw.smw module not found" end if frame.args[1] == nil then return "no parameter found" end local queryResult = mw.smw.ask( frame.args[1] .. '|?fless_T12_‹x1› |?fless_T12_‹x2› |?fless_T12_‹x3› |?fless_S2_‹x1› |?fless_S2_‹x2› |?fless_S2_‹x3› |?est_T12_‹x1› |?est_T12_‹x2› |?est_T12_‹x3› |?est_S2_‹x1› |?est_S2_‹x2› |?est_S2_‹x3› |?inclinazione_dx_‹x1› |?inclinazione_dx_‹x2› |?inclinazione_dx_‹x3› |?inclinazione_sx_‹x1› |?inclinazione_sx_‹x2› |? inclinazione_sx_‹x3› |?#-=page|mainlabel=-' ) if queryResult == nil then return "(no values): " .. dump(frame.args) end if type( queryResult ) == "table" then local myResult = "" local fless_T12_x1 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Fless T12 ‹x1›']) local fless_T12_x2 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Fless T12 ‹x2›']) local fless_T12_x3 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Fless T12 ‹x3›']) local fless_S2_x1 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Fless S2 ‹x1›']) local fless_S2_x2 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Fless S2 ‹x2›']) local fless_S2_x3 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Fless S2 ‹x3›']) local est_T12_x1 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Est T12 ‹x1›']) local est_T12_x2 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Est T12 ‹x2›']) local est_T12_x3 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Est T12 ‹x3›']) local est_S2_x1 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Est S2 ‹x1›']) local est_S2_x2 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Est S2 ‹x2›']) local est_S2_x3 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Est S2 ‹x3›']) local inclinazione_dx_x1 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Inclinazione dx ‹x1›']) local inclinazione_dx_x2 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Inclinazione dx ‹x2›']) local inclinazione_dx_x3 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Inclinazione dx ‹x3›']) local inclinazione_sx_x1 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Inclinazione sx ‹x1›']) local inclinazione_sx_x2 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Inclinazione sx ‹x2›']) local inclinazione_sx_x3 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Inclinazione sx ‹x3›']) local fless_T12_media = (fless_T12_x1 + fless_T12_x2 + fless_T12_x3) / 3.0 local fless_S2_media = (fless_S2_x1 + fless_S2_x2 + fless_S2_x3) / 3.0 local flessione_L_netta = fless_T12_media - fless_S2_media local est_T12_media = (est_T12_x1 + est_T12_x2 + est_T12_x3) / 3.0 local est_S2_media = (est_S2_x1 + est_S2_x2 + est_S2_x3) / 3.0 local estensione_L_netta = est_T12_media - est_S2_media local flesso_estensione_LS = fless_T12_media + est_T12_media local flesso_estensione_S = fless_S2_media + est_S2_media local flesso_estensione_L_netta = flessione_L_netta + estensione_L_netta local inclinazione_dx_media = (inclinazione_dx_x1 + inclinazione_dx_x2 + inclinazione_dx_x3) / 3.0 local inclinazione_sx_media = (inclinazione_sx_x1 + inclinazione_sx_x2 + inclinazione_sx_x3) / 3.0 local inclinazione_totale = inclinazione_dx_media + inclinazione_sx_media local gamma_totale_di_movimento_della_colonna = flesso_estensione_L_netta + inclinazione_totale local dStore = {} dStore['fless_T12_‹media›'] = fless_T12_media dStore['fless_S2_‹media›'] = fless_S2_media dStore['flessione_L_netta'] = flessione_L_netta dStore['est_T12_‹media›'] = est_T12_media dStore['est_S2_‹media›'] = est_S2_media dStore['estensione_L_netta'] = estensione_L_netta dStore['flesso_estensione_LS'] = flesso_estensione_LS dStore['flesso_estensione_S'] = flesso_estensione_S dStore['flesso_estensione_L_netta'] = flesso_estensione_L_netta dStore['inclinazione_dx_‹media›'] = inclinazione_dx_media dStore['inclinazione_sx_‹media›'] = inclinazione_sx_media dStore['inclinazione_totale'] = inclinazione_totale dStore['gamma_totale_di_movimento_della_colonna'] = gamma_totale_di_movimento_della_colonna local result = mw.smw.set(dStore) if result == false then return 'error while storing results' else return 'Indici aggiornati da ' .. dump(queryResult[1]) end end return end return p

function dump(o) if type(o) == 'table' then local s = '{ ' for k,v in pairs(o) do if type(k) ~= 'number' then k = '"'..k..'"' end s = s .. '['..k..'] = ' .. dump(v) .. ',' end return s .. '} ' else return tostring(o) end end function checkIfNil(value) if value == nil or value == '' then return 0.0 end return tonumber(value) end local p = {} function p.srs22(frame) if not mw.smw then return "mw.smw module not found" end if frame.args[1] == nil then return "no parameter found" end local queryResult = mw.smw.ask( frame.args[1] .. '|?#-=page |?quesito_1 |?quesito_2 |?quesito_3 |?quesito_4 |?quesito_5 |?quesito_6 |?quesito_7 |?quesito_8 |?quesito_9 |?quesito_10 |?quesito_11 |?quesito_12 |?quesito_13 |?quesito_14 |?quesito_15 |?quesito_16 |?quesito_17 |?quesito_18 |?quesito_19 |?quesito_20 |?quesito_21 |?quesito_22 |?mainlabel=-') if queryResult == nil then return "(no values): " .. dump(frame.args) end if type( queryResult ) == "table" then local quesito_1 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 1']) local quesito_2 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 2']) local quesito_3 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 3']) local quesito_4 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 4']) local quesito_5 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 5']) local quesito_6 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 6']) local quesito_7 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 7']) local quesito_8 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 8']) local quesito_9 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 9']) local quesito_10 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 10']) local quesito_11 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 11']) local quesito_12 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 12']) local quesito_13 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 13']) local quesito_14 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 14']) local quesito_15 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 15']) local quesito_16 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 16']) local quesito_17 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 17']) local quesito_18 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 18']) local quesito_19 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 19']) local quesito_20 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 20']) local quesito_21 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 21']) local quesito_22 = checkIfNil(queryResult[1]['Quesito 22']) local totale_SRS22_somma = quesito_1 + quesito_2 + quesito_3 + quesito_4 + quesito_5 + quesito_6 + quesito_7 + quesito_8 + quesito_9 + quesito_10 + quesito_11 + quesito_12 + quesito_13 + quesito_14 + quesito_15 + quesito_16 + quesito_17 + quesito_18 + quesito_19 + quesito_20 + quesito_21 + quesito_22 local totale_SRS22_media = (quesito_1 + quesito_2 + quesito_3 + quesito_4 + quesito_5 + quesito_6 + quesito_7 + quesito_8 + quesito_9 + quesito_10 + quesito_11 + quesito_12 + quesito_13 + quesito_14 + quesito_15 + quesito_16 + quesito_17 + quesito_18 + quesito_19 + quesito_20 + quesito_21 + quesito_22) / 22.0 local somma_immagine_di_se = quesito_4 + quesito_6 + quesito_10 + quesito_14 + quesito_19 local media_immagine_di_se = (quesito_4 + quesito_6 + quesito_10 + quesito_14 + quesito_19) / 5.0 local somma_funzione = quesito_5 + quesito_9 + quesito_12 + quesito_15 + quesito_18 local media_funzione = (quesito_5 + quesito_9 + quesito_12 + quesito_15 + quesito_18) / 5.0 local somma_dolore = quesito_1 + quesito_2 + quesito_8 + quesito_11 + quesito_17 local media_dolore = (quesito_1 + quesito_2 + quesito_8 + quesito_11 + quesito_17) / 5.0 local somma_salute_mentale = quesito_3 + quesito_7 + quesito_13 + quesito_16 + quesito_20 local media_salute_mentale = (quesito_3 + quesito_7 + quesito_13 + quesito_16 + quesito_20) / 5.0 local somma_soddisfazione = quesito_21 + quesito_22 local media_soddisfazione = (quesito_21 + quesito_22) / 2.0 local dStore = {} dStore['totale_SRS22_somma'] = totale_SRS22_somma dStore['totale_SRS22_media'] = totale_SRS22_media dStore['somma_immagine_di_se´'] = somma_immagine_di_se dStore['media_immagine_di_se´'] = media_immagine_di_se dStore['somma_funzione'] = somma_funzione dStore['media_funzione'] = media_funzione dStore['somma_dolore'] = somma_dolore dStore['media_dolore'] = media_dolore dStore['somma_salute_mentale'] = somma_salute_mentale dStore['media_salute_mentale'] = media_salute_mentale dStore['somma_soddisfazione'] = somma_soddisfazione dStore['media_soddisfazione'] = media_soddisfazione local result = mw.smw.set(dStore) if result == false then return 'error while storing results' else return 'Indici aggiornati da ' .. dump(queryResult) end end return end return p

__NOTOC__ This widget allows you to embed any web page on your wiki page using an iframe tag. Created by [https://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/User:Sergey_Chernyshev Sergey Chernyshev]. == Using this widget == For information on how to use this widget, see [https://www.mediawikiwidgets.org/Iframe widget description page on MediaWikiWidgets.org]. '''This widget should not be used on a publicly-editable wiki.''' While the URL is validated to be a valid URL, there is no way the widget can check the contents of the page that is included. When enabling this widget, you allow any user that can edit to include any page, including malicious pages (containing trojans, backdoors, viruses etc), pages that brake out of the iframe and pages that look like your site, but actually is a copy used for phishing. == Copy to your site == To use this widget on your site, just install [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Widgets MediaWiki Widgets extension] and copy the [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} full source code] of this page to your wiki as page '''{{FULLPAGENAME}}'''.
[[Visible to::whitelist|'''Visible to: ''']] [[Visible to group::viewers|viewers]] [[Visible to group::editors|editors]] [[Editable by::whitelist|'''Editable by: ''']] [[Editable by group::editors|editors]]
